verses.roman:
dekhiyā nā dekhe yata abhaktera gaṇa
ulūke nā dekhe yena sūryera kiraṇa

synonyms: dekhiyā—seeing; nā dekhe—they do not see; yata—all; abhaktera—of nondevotees; gaṇa—crowds; ulūke—the owl; nā dekhe—does not see; yena—just as; sūryera—of the sun; kiraṇa—rays.
translation: But faithless unbelievers do not see what is clearly evident, just as owls do not see the rays of the sun.
